channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Learn To Make Games in Godot 4 By GameDev.tv Encore
item.content:encoded: Been sitting on your game dev ambitions? Jump on this bundle of online courses from GameDev.tv, packed with expert instruction on the skills you need to develop both 2D and 3D games using Godot 4. Learn the fundamentals of game mechanics, animation, scripting, and more with courses dedicated to both 2D and 3D game development. Spread your wings with specialized courses covering topics like C#, multiplayer and mobile game development, and more. Also included are a host of premium asset packs to help your creations stand out. Kick off your game project today and help support Kiss the Ground with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate Unreal Mega Bundle
item.description: Unlock a universe of curated assets
item.content:encoded: Game developers and sound engineers, give your creations life with rich audio and vibrant visuals with our Ultimate Unreal Mega Bundle! This high-quality collection features a plethora of unique sounds and models for your environments, characters, soundtracks, and more for use in popular engines like Unreal. Get a gigantic bundle of assets to help bring your games to life and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete AWS, CompTIA, Azure,Google Cloud, and Cybersecurity Certification Bundle Encore
item.content:encoded: Supercharge your resume and update your skillset with this bundle of online courses from Mammoth Interactive, with a focus on skills and certifications to get you ready to work in AI tech, cloud systems, security, IT, and more. You'll get 350+ hours of instruction to get you ready for valuable certifications, including Azure AI Engineer Associate, CompTIA Security+, Google Professional Machine Learning Engineer, AWS, and others. Also included are courses focused on cutting-edge skills, like building generative AI applications that take advantage of Google Cloud's suite of robust AI services. Every course comes with an unofficial sample practice test to help you prepare for the exam. Pay what you want for this bundle of career-boosting instruction and help support the Children's Miracle Network.

item.title: Blender Core Skills: The Ultimate Blender Basics Bundle Remix
item.description: Your Blender skills just got better
item.content:encoded: Learn the basics of Blender with this bundle of courses from CG Cookie! This comprehensive curriculum will help you master the fundamentals of Blender with topics like Fundamentals of Mesh Modeling, Fundamentals of Digital Sculpting, Fundamentals of Materials and Shading, and more! Get the Ultimate Blenders Basics Bundle and take your skills to the next level with the expert advice and knowledge recorded in Blender 4.2 LTS. Help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!ics of Blender with this bundle of courses from CG Cookie!

item.title: The Black Friday Rust Bundle
item.description: Shake off the Rust on Black Friday
item.content:encoded: Learn Rust with this bundle of courses from Zenva! This comprehensive curriculum will help you level up your skills with courses like Learn Rust Programming for Beginners, Rust Web App Project - Real-Time Video Broadcasting, Build Your First Game with Rust and Bevy, and more. Get expert advice from the pros and the knowledge you seek. Master one of the premier general-purpose programming languages, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: Vocal Master Collection - Acapellas, Loops & Plugins For Music Production & Game Design
item.description: A new music bundle? Sounds nice!
item.content:encoded: This comprehensive audio bundle includes popular WA Production collections like Vocal Compressor, Mutant Reverb, and more! Create breathtaking soundscapes, master intricate vocal effects, and produce tracks across any genre with ease using an expansive range of professional tools and vocal libraries. From lush vocal harmonies to gritty shouts, this collection is packed with endless possibilities. Perfect for seasoned producers, sound designers, and creators who want to push boundaries and produce studio-quality projects with unparalleled creativity. Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support Music Will with your purchase!

item.title: ACI - Professional Developer: Easy Steps To Mastery
item.content:encoded: Professional developers—level up your skills with this comprehensive bundle of courses including Intro to Docker, Intro to NodeJS, HTML5 Canvas Graphics and Animations, and more! Improve your skills in Java, NumPy, HTML5, and other programs pros use every day. Become a subject matter expert in a variety of fields and advance your career—get the expert advice and knowledge you seek, and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase!

item.title: The Ultimate Unreal Engine Sci-Fi Creators Kit
item.description: Far out assets for Unreal Engine
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build amazing dream worlds with the Ultimate Unreal Engine Sci-Fi Creators Kit! This high-quality collection features environments, characters, meshes, models, animations, music, SFX, and more for use in Unreal Engine. Access assets for alien soldiers, sci-fi railroads, and other out of this world creators. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Shapelab Creator's Kit: 3D & VR Sculpting Bundle
item.content:encoded: Create high-quality 3D models from the palms of your hands with the Shapelab 3D Bundle from Leopoly! This high-quality collection features a Shapelab 2024 license, a voucher for the 2025 edition, and more! Create 3D dragons, dinosaurs, and other mysterious creatures with this awesome bundle. Get the assets you need to help bring your creations to life, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: MAPS Extravaganza Revisited 2024
item.description: Bring your fantasy worlds to life
item.content:encoded: Design maps for your own tabletop campaigns, fantasy settings, and more! This bundle includes everything you need to create stunning, print-worthy works of art that will bring your worlds to life. Get powerful software like Campaign Cartographer 3+ (including a Lifetime License), City Designer 3, Dungeon Designer 3, Tome of Ultimate Mapping, and more. Unlock a treasury that will take your tabletop games and fantasy stories to the next level, and help support Save the Children with your purchase.

item.title: Monument Studios: TTRPG Audio Compendium
item.description: A bundle bursting with amazing music
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with this bundle of royalty-free sounds from Monument Studios! This massive library features loops, samples, one-shots, instruments, and others for a variety of genres & styles. Amazing collections like Battle Music Vol 1 & 2, Fantasy Music Vol 1, Cinematic Hits, and more. Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: The 2024 Learn Unity Game Development Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Learn to create games with Unity with these online courses from GameDev.tv! This comprehensive curriculum covers core skills and advanced concepts for the powerful and popular development platform. Find out how to make a 2D RPG combat system, VR experience, or turn-based strategy game. Get trained up on visual scripting, multiplayer, network coding, and more. Level up your Unity game dev skills, and help support Oceana with your purchase!

GameDev.tv have spent the last decade working with world class instructors to create the perfect learning experience for game development. Join our global community of over 2 million students and start making your own games today!

item.title: Gamedev Market: Best of 2024
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build your worlds with this bundle of 75+ assets from GameDev Market! This massive collection features a diverse range of high-quality assets, including detailed tilesets, unique character sprites, huge music and sound effects packs, and so much more. Perfect for indie developers and seasoned studios alike, this bundle has everything you need to help bring your game to life, and help support The Michael J. Fox Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Super Game Asset Bundle (+7,000 Assets) for Godot, Unreal and Unity
item.description: So many assets, so little time
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build your worlds with the Super Game Assets Bundle for Unreal, Godot, and Unity—featuring 7,000+ audio, visual, and environmental assets. This high-quality bundle features a truly diverse collection of themed assets ranging from medieval to cyberpunk. Create the next great RPG or action game with the Super Game Assets Bundle and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: DESIGN with CorelDRAW & PERFECT with AI
item.content:encoded: Master one of the most widely adapted design programs with our CorelDRAW 2024 Bundle. Get amazing software like Corel Painter 2023, PaintShop Pro 2023, and Vision FX. Learn professional graphic design software with vector, technical illustration, and CAD software options to design logos, posters, drafting, and more. Level up your creative skills and help support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals today!
